column1: The Purple Pig////Friendly and helpful staff. Clean restrooms with good smelling soap and very moisturizing lotion. Although street parking is available
column2: walking or public transportation are better ways of getting there. This restaurant is located near a lot of stores for those who are interested in shopping nearby. There is indoor and outdoor seating available. I did feel
column4: rushed to eat and get out even though I was only a table for 2 eating at 4:30pm. Â
